title: Did an Ohio Man Die of COVID-19 After Vowing Not To Wear a Face Mask?
subtitle: The tragic death of 37-year-old Richard Rose attracted headlines around the world in the summer of 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Richard Rose of Port Clinton, Ohio died of COVID-19 after earlier vowing not to buy a face mask and dismissing advice to use face masks as "hype."
